name: Sorfildor
description:
--CONTROLS--

Sorry I didn't add the controls in the game. I gotta go fuck around IRL. Anyways.

"W" Jump

"A" Left

"D" Right

"Q" Attack

If you collide with a potion. Left click on the potion on the corner ,and then you'll be full health

--CREDITS--

Credits basicly what I made the art off of, like traced ,but I colored it too. Like a coloring book!

-Kazzador's "Fantasy Sprites" - For the "boss" demon thing.

-thestoryteller01 - For the ghost/skeleton thing.

-Eventua's Bucket "Some sprites" - For the player

-Erang's The Dark Dungeon alternate version- The music

"Knight" - .html

"Demon" - http://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?/topic/683-kazzadors-fantasy-sprites/

"Skeleton/Ghost" - http://thestoryteller01.deviantart.com/art/Skeleto...

"Music" - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64R-10xNfmk
